repo_description: A Node.js framework for creating GraphQL API servers easily and without a lot of boilerplate.

schemas.name: schema.gql
schema.gql
schema.gql
query.graphql

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/query.graphql:
type Query {
  users(page: Int): [User]!
  user(id: Int!): User!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/user.graphql:
type Geo {
  lat: String!
  lng: String!
}

type Address {
  street: String!
  suite: String!
  city: String!
  zipcode: String!
  geo: Geo!
}

type Company {
  name: String!
  catchPhrase: String!
  bs: String!
}

type User {
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  username: String!
  email: String!
  address: Address!
  phone: String!
  website: String!
  company: Company!
  posts: [Post]!
  todos: [Todo]!
  albums: [Album]!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/post.graphql:
type Post {
  user: User!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  body: String!
  comments: [Comment]!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/todo.graphql:
type Todo {
  user: User!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  completed: Boolean!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/album.graphql:
type Album {
  user: User!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  photos: [Photo]!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/comment.graphql:
type Comment {
  post: Post!
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  email: String!
  body: String!
}

# https://github.com/sergiodxa/grial/blob/b4529f75ff1ba483d231dd2e8a8a9cf8aff043b9/examples/jsonplaceholder-wrapper/schemas/photo.graphql:
type Photo {
  album: Album!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  url: String!
  thumbnailUrl: String!
}

schemas.name: user.graphql
schemas.content:
type Geo {
  lat: String!
  lng: String!
}

type Address {
  street: String!
  suite: String!
  city: String!
  zipcode: String!
  geo: Geo!
}

type Company {
  name: String!
  catchPhrase: String!
  bs: String!
}

type User {
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  username: String!
  email: String!
  address: Address!
  phone: String!
  website: String!
  company: Company!
  posts: [Post]!
  todos: [Todo]!
  albums: [Album]!
}

schemas.name: album.graphql
todo.graphql
comment.graphql
schemas.content:
type Comment {
  post: Post!
  id: Int!
  name: String!
  email: String!
  body: String!
}

schemas.name: post.graphql
schemas.content:
type Post {
  user: User!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  body: String!
  comments: [Comment]!
}

schemas.name: photo.graphql
schemas.content:
type Photo {
  album: Album!
  id: Int!
  title: String!
  url: String!
  thumbnailUrl: String!
}
